item.title: “AIC-BIMTECH, in collaboration with the Canadian High Commission in India, organized the CTA program “Waste to Wealth”
item.description: “AIC-BIMTECH, in collaboration with the Canadian High Commission in India, organized the CTA program “Waste to Wealth” “AIC-BIMTECH, in collaboration with the Canadian High Commission in India, organized a week-long CTA program in various geographies of India on the theme “Waste to Wealth,” which marked its foundation in Delhi.

item.title: Siemens Gamesa’s Engineering Centre in India grows to become one of its largest hubs for wind energy technology in the world
item.description: Siemens Gamesa’s Engineering Centre in India grows to become one of its largest hubs for wind energy technology in the world Siemens Gamesa to expand operations in Bengaluru with the inauguration of a second office for its engineers The Engineering Centre forms one of three major technology hubs for Siemens Gamesa globally, driving the development of future wind turbines The facility now employs 1,100 engineers, which is forecast to grow in coming years BENGALURU, India, Nov.

item.title: The Cambridge Dictionary Word of the Year 2022 is… HOMER
item.description: The Cambridge Dictionary Word of the Year 2022 is… HOMER Business Wire India ‘Homer’ is Word of the Year, according to the world’s most popular online dictionary for learners of English.

item.title: Clarivate Names World’s Influential Researchers with Highly Cited Researchers 2022 List
item.description: Clarivate Names World’s Influential Researchers with Highly Cited Researchers 2022 List Institute for Scientific Information deepens qualitative analysis of annual list to improve detection of gaming, misconduct LONDON, Nov.

item.title: Oxalys annonce une première opération de croissance externe avec COBuy
item.description: Oxalys annonce une première opération de croissance externe avec COBuy Oxalys, spécialiste de la digitalisation des achats et des dépenses, annonce la reprise de COBuy et lance sa nouvelle stratégie de croissance.

item.title: Venture Catalysts ++ – the House of Unicorns, Soonicorns Delivers 54 Startups Above USD 50mn in 7 Years
item.description: Venture Catalysts ++ – the House of Unicorns, Soonicorns Delivers 54 Startups Above USD 50mn in 7 Years Business Wire India Venture Catalysts Group (Vcats++), India’s first integrated incubator and a full-stack investor for early to growth stage startups, has announced that about 54 of its portfolio startups have crossed $50 million valuation this year.

item.title: Esri Enters into Agreement with United Nations Population Fund to Help Modernize National Statistics Programs
item.description: Esri Enters into Agreement with United Nations Population Fund to Help Modernize National Statistics Programs Business Wire India A population and housing census is among the most complex and massive peacetime exercises a nation can undertake, requiring careful planning, resourcing, and implementation.

item.title: Marriott Vacation Club Opens Newest Resort, Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Terrace
item.description: Marriott Vacation Club Opens Newest Resort, Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Terrace Business Wire India Marriott Vacation Club — a global industry leader in Vacation Ownership and brand of Marriott Vacations Worldwide (NYSE: VAC) — announced today they have officially opened Marriott’s Bali Nusa Dua Terrace.

item.title: DEINOVE REQUESTS RECEIVERSHIP PROCEEDINGS
item.description: DEINOVE REQUESTS RECEIVERSHIP PROCEEDINGS DEINOVE (Euronext Growth Paris: ALDEI), a French biotech company, pioneer in the exploration and exploitation of bacterial biodiversity to address the urgent, global challenge of antibiotic resistance, announces having filed today a declaration of cessation of payments (“déclaration de cessation des paiements“) and a request for receivership proceedings (“procédure de redressement judiciaire”) of the Company… The post DEINOVE REQUESTS RECEIVERSHIP PROCEEDINGS appeared first on DKODING.

item.title: HDFC Life elevates Suresh Badami as Deputy Managing Director
item.description: HDFC Life elevates Suresh Badami as Deputy Managing Director Business Wire India HDFC Life, one of India's leading life insurers, at its board meeting, announced that it has elevated Suresh Badami to the role of Deputy Managing Director.

item.title: LBank Exchange Will List VNX Gold (VNXAU) on October 25, 2022
